definition: a short labored intake of breath with the mouth open, to breathe noisily, as when one is exhausted
details:
noun
- a short labored intake of breath with the mouth open
= example: a short labored intake of breath with the mouth open
= synonyms: gasp
- usually in the plural; a garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately
= example: usually in the plural; a garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately
= synonyms: trouser
- the noise made by a short puff of steam, as from an engine
= example: the noise made by a short puff of steam, as from an engine
verb
- to breathe noisily, as when one is exhausted
= example: to breathe noisily, as when one is exhausted
= synonyms: heave
- to utter while panting, as if out of breath
= example: to utter while panting, as if out of breath
